welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Signal Hill, where a charming city meets stunning views! Get ready to explore our picturesque town known for its rich history and vibrant culture. Enjoy your stay and soak in the beauty of Signal Hill."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Daugherty Field Terminal
terminals.description: The Daugherty Field Terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Torrance Airport, catering to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at LAX, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving Southwest Airlines and other carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving Delta and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving Delta and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving American Airlines and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving American Airlines and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving Alaska Airlines and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving United Airlines and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving United Airlines and other airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login after a certain amount of time.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for airlines such as Alaska Airlines, American Airlines, Delta Airlines, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Frontier Airlines, JetBlue Airways, and WestJet.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the airport with unlimited usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bob Hope Airport, primarily used for regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
